info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
forgedhallpass
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: reforme-retraite.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Referer: https://reforme-retraite.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://travail-emploi.gouv.fr/retraite'
